message.name: ERR_XRV_NO_SUCH_SCHEMA
message.locale: No schema with that name exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SCHEMA_NAME_EXIST
message.locale: A Schema with the same name already exists.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SCHEMA_NAME_IN_USE
message.locale: Cannot remove this Schema as it is in use.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SCHEMA_DISPLAY_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A display name must be specified for schema "%1s".
message.cause: A data store schema display name must be specified, it is either null or empty.
message.action: Ensure that the display name is not null or empty.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SCHEMA_DISPLAY_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A data store schema with display name "%1s" already exists.
message.cause: A data store schema with that display name already exists.
message.action: Give the schema a unique display name.
